text: Make a run on Archives. If successful, instead of accessing cards, add Political Graffiti to an agenda in the Corp's score area as a hosted condition counter with the text "This agenda is worth -1 agenda points. Trash Political Graffiti if the Corp purges virus counters."
title: Political Graffiti

flavor: "Credits spend anywhere in the worlds, but there are other forms of currency."
text: Once per turn, you may jack out when you encounter a sentry.
title: Nero Severn: Information Broker

flavor: "I'm on a need-to-know basis. I need to know everything." -Nero Severn
text: +1[mu] +1[link] Whenever you jack out, the Corp reveals 1 card from HQ at random. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Reflection

text:
[click]: Look at the top X cards of your stack and arrange them in any order. X is the number of copies of Spy Camera installed.
[trash]: Look at the top card of R&D.
Limit 6 per deck.
title: Spy Camera

flavor: Leverage, secrets, access, and influence are currency as valuable as credits. But credits work, too.
text: Install only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. [trash], pay the trash cost of a rezzed card: Trash that card.
title: Political Operative

text: 1[credit]: Break ice subroutine on a piece of ice with 3 or more subtypes. 1[credit]: +1 strength. 2[credit]: Swap Sadyojata with a deva program from your grip.
title: Sadyojata

text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. When you steal an agenda, add "Freedom Through Equality" to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
title: "Freedom Through Equality"

flavor: "Our shared humanity is our greatest strength. And as we share more broadly, our strength grows, not dwindles."
text: Each player has 1 additional [click] to spend during his or her turn.
title: Akshara Sareen

flavor: "Bureaucracy and red tape have been weaponized." -Fake-ir
text: Whenever the Corp rezzes an asset or upgrade, you may pay credits equal to its rez cost and trash Councilman. If you do, derez that asset or upgrade. The Corp cannot rez it for the remainder of this turn.
title: Councilman

text:
Place 3 agenda counters on Voting Machine Initiative when you score it.
When the Runner's turn begins, you may spend 1 hosted agenda counter. If you do, the Runner loses [click], if able.
title: Voting Machine Initiative

flavor: "Our research says the public views clones as more human than bioroids. Historically, this has been a liability. Let's make it a strength."
text: When your turn begins, you may add 1 operation from Archives to HQ if there is no ice protecting this server.
title: Clone Suffrage Movement

flavor: "There's no conflict of interest here. These are complex issues with highly technical minutiae. It's only natural that the experts should lay down the guidelines."
text: When your turn begins, do 1 net damage if there is no ice protecting this server.
title: Bio-Ethics Association

flavor: "Politics is a dirty business. But so is business." -Krishnan Sareen
text:
[interrupt] â€“ Whenever you would draw a card, look at that card. If it is an agenda, instead of adding it to HQ you may reveal and install it.
<errata>Errata from CR 1.4</errata>
title: Political Dealings

text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. When you score an agenda, add "Clones are not People" to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
title: "Clones are not People"

flavor: Being a Mumbad sensie star means a glamorous life, though it is lived in constant fear of blackmail-or worse-from orgcrime.
text: When your turn begins, you may draw 3 cards if there is no ice protecting this server. If you do, add 1 card from HQ to the bottom of R&D.
title: Sensie Actors Union

flavor: "Money is speech and I am listening intently." -Krishnan Sareen
text: When your turn begins, gain 3[credit] if there is no ice protecting this server.
title: Commercial Bankers Group

flavor: Mumbad's public city corporation is tightly connected to all the other corporations.
text: [click]: Search R&D for an alliance card, reveal it, and play or install it (paying all costs). Shuffle R&D.
title: Mumbad City Hall

flavor: Efficiency means profiting from things everyone was doing anyway.
text:
Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine on Bailiff, gain 1[credit].
[subroutine] End the run.
title: Bailiff

text: Whenever you rez a card in or protecting this server (not including Surat City Grid), you may rez another card, lowering the rez cost by 2. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Surat City Grid
